show_name: Ai no Katachi: Etchi na Onnanoko wa Kirai... Desu ka? (OAV)
other_title: 愛のカタチ ～エッチな女のコは嫌い…ですか？～ (Japanese)
愛のカタチ ～エッチな女の子は嫌い…ですか？～ (Japanese)
plot: The secret world behind the amateur porn magazines. Young girls discover that it is really easy to make money working for guys who take photos of their sexual life. And some of those girls get so hot—thinking of the many readers who will see their sinful acts—that they go crazy and wild.
